Reference

All functions

example_sce

Subsetted mouse ESC `SingleCellExperiment` object

fastRUVIII()

A fast version of the ruv::RUVIII algorithm

getAdjustedMat()

getAdjustedMat

ruvSimulate()

Simulate a simple matrix or SingleCellExperiment to test internals of scMerge

scMerge()

Perform the scMerge algorithm

scMerge2()

Perform the scMerge2 algorithm

scMerge2h()

Perform the scMerge2 (hierarchical) algorithm

scRUVIII()

scRUVIII: RUVIII algorithm optimised for single cell data

scRUVg()

RUVg function for single cell (under development)

scReplicate()

Create replicate matrix for scMerge algorithm

scSEGIndex()

Single Cell Stably Express Gene Index

sce_cbind()

Combind several SingleCellExperiment objects from different batches/experiments

segList

Stably expressed gene list in official gene symbols for both human and mouse

segList_ensemblGeneID

Stably expressed gene list in EnsemblGeneID for both human and mouse
